reviewText: I bought this video because my other one is wore out!!  Ray Boltz has such an amazing gift of sharing his deepest feelings through music and song!!

Nice selection of his music, with a patriotic theme:

This Is America
An Honor To Serve
Fallen Not Forgotten
I Pledge Allegiance To The Lamb
Jesus Real Loud
What If I Give All
Watch The Lamb
Scars
The Sinner's Prayer
Thank You
